Title: Drones
Plot: At ease, gentlemen! When Van Driessen takes the class on a field trip to a military base, it's Beavis and Butt-Head in the virtual pilot seats of drone planes on a Middle Eastern mission. They feel the need for speed, but is it a video game or real life? When these two are in the hot seat, it's only a matter of time before the general has their head! (Huh-huh, he said 'head.')
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
